thread.section_title: RushMyPassport.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RushMyPassport.com | rushmypassport.com
thread.title: Lorenzo DelSanto

author: Lorenzo DelSanto
title: Lorenzo DelSanto
text:
I screwed up. I booked a non-refundable hotel in Canada and completely spaced on the fact that I needed a passport. I had 2 weeks. RushMyPassport saved my vacation. Jason Austin was fantastic, I can't tell you how many times I exchanged emails with him, clarifying things, double checking things, and just generally worrying. I'd always get the FASTEST, most helpful responses. I got my passport about 5 days sooner than I was expecting, AND the passport card that I ordered came with it, even though I was told it may take an additional 3-4 weeks. You might think this service is costly, but trust me, it's worth twice what they're charging when you're in a bind like I was. My stress has melted away and I'm ready for vacation now!
Thank you RushMyPassport and thank you Jason!
